mention.title: WhoÂ´s calling me?
mention.line1: Oh, hello [username], how are you? My name is [me].
mention.line2: Well, if you wanna know my job, it is to help your server in many creative and different ways!
mention.line3: Maybe you don't know my prefix on this server and that's why you pinged me. If thatÂ´s your question, itÂ´s `[prefix]`.
mention.line4: If you have any suggestions or found any loose ends, join my [support server]([url]) to talk with my creator.
mention.line5: If you wanna add me to your server, just click [aqui]([url])!
mention.line6: And finally, thanks for messaging me. It was great to explain who I am <3

status.7: Did you know IÂ´m OpenSource? No? Then use the command "git" and help my creator with my improvements ;)
